form_title.ms_form_title_llm_v1: APPLICATION FOR STATUS AS PERMANENT RESIDENT, O.M.B. No. 43-R0400

full_text: Screened by NARA, 7/6/2023 APPLICATION FOR STATUS AS PERMANENT RESIDENT Form Approved O.M.B. No. 43-R0400 FEE STAMP File No. CTION 101 OF THE ACT OF APPLICATION FOR THE BENEFITS OF SECTION: Sec. 203(a)(7) and Sec. 245, TOBER 28, 1977 I&N Act Sec. 245, I&N Act Sec. 214(d), I&N Act Sec. 249 I&N Act Sec. 13. Act of 9/11/57 (DO NOT WRITE ABOVE THIS LINE.) (SEE INSTRUCTIONS BEFORE FILLING IN APPLICATION. IF YOU NEED MORE SPACE TO ANSWER FULLY ANY QUESTION ON THIS FORM, USE A SEPARATE SHEET AND IDENTIFY EACH ANSWER WITH THE NUMBER OF THE CORRESPONDING QUESTION. FILL IN WITH TYPEWRITER OR PRINT IN BLOCK LETTERS IN INK.) 1. I hereby apply for the status of a lawful permanent resident alien on the following basis: (Check box A. B. C. D, E. or F) INDOCHINA PERUGEE PUBLIC LAW 95-145 A. As a refugee to whom an immigrant visa is immediately available (Section 203(a)(7) and Section 245, I&N Act). B. As a person who entered the U.S. with a visa issued to me as the fiancee or fiance of a U.S. citizen whom I married within 90 days after my entry, or as a child of such fiancee or fiance (Sec. 214(d) I&N Act). C. As a former government official, or as a member of the immediate family of such official (Section 13, Act of September 11, 1957). D. As a person to whom an immigrant visa is immediately available, other than one described above (Section 245, I&N Act). E. As a person who has resided in the United States continuously since prior to July 1, 1924 (Section 249, I&N Act). F. As a person who has resided in the United States continuously since a date on or after July 1, 1924, but before June 30, 1948 (Section 249, I&N Act). 2. My name is (Last in capital letters) (First Name) (Middle Name) 3. Sex Phone number LE SAO THI Male Female 944-7030 4. I reside in the United States at: (c/o) (No. and Street) (Apt. No.) (City) (State) (ZIP Code) 5. Have you ever applied before for permanent resident 0222 LANETT AVE. WHITTER 90605 CA status in the U.S.? Yes No 6. My alien registration number 7. I am a citizen of (Country) 8. Date of Birth (If "Yes", give the date and place of filing and A21199209 ViETNAM 1-15-13 final disposition.) 9. Place of Birth (City or Town) (County, Province, or State) (Country) QUANE NAM S. ViETNAM 10. Name as appears on nonimmigrant document (Form I-94) LE SAO I last arrived in the United States at the port of (City and State) on (Month) (Day) (Year) by (Name of vessel or other means of travel) C 5-7-75 as a (visitor, student, crewman, parolee, etc.) my I-94permit,number is Military Airlift. Parslee 0192929 I was was not inspected. 11. My nonimmigrant visa, number was issued by the on (Month) (Day) (Year) 12. I am single married United States Consul at (City) (Country) divorced widowed 13. I have been married stain times, including my present marriage, if now married. (If you are now married give the following:) a. Number of times my busband or wife has been married b. Name of husband or wife (Wife give maiden name) De c. My husband or wife resides with me apart from me at Address (Apta No )(No. & Street)(Town or City)(Province or State) (Country) deceased 1971 14. a. I have Csons or daughters as follows: (Complete all columns as to each son or daughter; if living with you state "with me" in last column: otherwise give city and state or country of son's or daughter's residence). Name Sex Place of Birth Date of Birth Now living at Quanq M Hanoi Oct,20,46 Niles, Michigan b. The following members of my family are also applying for permanent resident status: FOIA (b)(6) 15. I list below all organizations, societies, clubs, and associations, past or present. in which I have held membership in the United States or a foreign country, and the periods and places of such membership. (If you have never been a member of any organization, state "None".) NONE UNITED STATES DEPARTMENT OF JUSTICE RECEIVED TRANS. IN RET'D-TRANS. OUT COMPLETED Immigration and Naturalization Service Form I-485 (Rev. 1-10-77) N (Page 1)
